channel.title: Adding Movement to Armor
channel.description: I did a dragon platelegs model and then i added it to my client. my guy wears it and everything except when he walks there is no motion in the legs only the feet so it looks like he is walking on his tip-toes and when he stops walking the legs are just straight down instead of being separated like theyre supposed to be. can i get some help please.

item.description:

item.title: Adding Movement to Armor

@senorlemon wrote:

I did a dragon platelegs model and then i added it to my client. my guy wears it and everything except when he walks there is no motion in the legs only the feet so it looks like he is walking on his tip-toes and when he stops walking the legs are just straight down instead of being separated like theyre supposed to be. can i get some help please.
